doc:
Francis J. Grandon https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Francis_J._Grandon 0 Francis "Frank" J. Grandon (1879 – July 11, 1929) was an American silent film actor and director who acted in almost 100 films and directed over 100. Frank Grandon's obituary, printed in newspapers from coast-to- coast, called him "the father of movie serial motion pictures" and a mentor to many young film stars. Francis_"_Frank_"_J._Grandon ( 1879 – July_11_,_1929 ) was an_American_silent_film_actor and director who acted in almost_100_films and directed over 100 . Frank_Grandon 's_obituary , printed in newspapers from coast-to - coast , called him " the_father of movie_serial_motion_pictures " and a_mentor to many_young_film_stars .
